import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Segment, Container, Divider, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; class AboutPage extends Component { render() { return (
SCSE19-0299: Block-Chain Based Question Answering System
Project Details

This is an experimental system for School Of Computer Science & Engineereing (SCSE) Final Year Project titled SCSE19-0299.

System Rules & Guidelines

All users are to only post questions from past year examinations. No posting of Assignments or Tutorial Questions is allowed. Fraudulent accounts will be removed from the system and banned from future use.

Earning Tokens

Each user is given 10 tokens each. User can be rewarded additional tokens by providing answers with the highest up votes for each questions. User can also be rewarded 2 tokens for up voting the answer that is awarded the reward for the question.

System Functionality
Post New Question

Access using "Create New Question" tab above. Each creation of new question requires at least 1 token as the reward.

Provide Answer To Question

All questions posted can be view from the Home Page access via "Home" tab above. Clicking on the question title will provide additional details on the question as well as providing the form to submit an answer for the question. No tokens are required for answering of question.

Voting Of Answers

When the question is in the "Voting Phase", all users can view all answers that are submitted and up vote or down vote each answer depending on it's relevance and helpfulness. Each up vote or down vote requires 1 token. Each user can only up vote or down each answer once.

) } } export default AboutPage;
